story.kicker_image_caption: Singer Shaan. Picture courtesy: Twitter/ Shaan
story.storykicker: The Voice India Kids will allow young singers between the age group of 6-14 years to showcase their talent in front of a national audience.
story.storybody:
Jabse Tere Naina singer Shaan, who was previously seen as a coach on the singing reality show The Voice India, will soon be returning to your screens as a coach on  the upcoming children's version of the show, The Voice India Kids.

I am very thrilled to be back as the coach on the show and I am looking forward to a brand new season of The Voice India Kids. The Voice is the most sought after singing show on television and this will be a huge platform for these 'young battalions' to showcase their talent," Shaan said in a statement to IANS.

Also Read: Jay Bhanushali to host The Voice India for kids?

The Voice India Kids will allow young singers between the age group of 6-14 years to showcase their talent in front of a national audience.

Apart from Shaan, The Voice India-- the Indian edition of the internationally acclaimed reality format The Voice-- featured Himesh Reshammiya, Sunidhi Chauhan and Mika Singh.

Shaan will be joined by singer Neeti Mohan as a coach for The Voice India Kids.

The show will reportedly will go on air in July on &TV.

(With inputs from IANS)
